Devs are lazy & self surving. updates to games that break it with no resolve. Most recently the DX11 bug...instead of finding a fix they've just removed windows 8 as a supported OS.....when they made it not support.

Me parece el juego con mas bugs de la historia, la compaÃ±ia solo mira por facilitar la victoria a los asesinos dandoles perks que facilitan su velocidad, ralentizan la velocidad de reparacion y ya no vamos a hablar ni de mayers ni de freddy dos asesinos que necesitan un nerfeo brutal. 
Pero esta claro esta compaÃ±ia solo piensa en sacar dinero con los DLC no les importa nada los jugadores, sino arreglarian que te desconectaras de repente, que las partidas las llevaran los asesinos y casi siempre con lag, y mil cosas mas.

One of the bests

I purchased the game close to its release and I have to say that this is probably one of the most toxic, unfinished, one sided game I have ever played. The developers don't know what they are doing, the game has been consistently broken since it came out and the developers have barely scratched the surface with rectifications. Points disappearing, SWF games crashing, no prompt response from devs when an issue has been highlighted plus they constantly upload one 'dev stream' a week which consists of them chatting one load of rubbish with no relation to the games problems adding to this is the lack of communication aswell to their community.

Killers seem to gain more respect and what I mean by this is if the killers side complains about a certain perk/survivor/complainaboutanythingandeverythingthatsurvivorshas then the devs prioritise that... When it comes to a survivor complaint its put at the back of the shelf left to gather dust! Killers gain more speed, perks that let you actually see survivors on the map, the new dlc with Freddy is absurd, there is a perk that stops survivors from escaping if he hooks the obsession.

Fk this game, Fk the devs and any game they release I would boycott!
This is a good game!

å¯ç©æ€§å¾ˆé«˜ï¼Œå€¼å¾—å…¥æ‰‹ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯äººæ•°è§„æ¨¡è¿˜ä¸å¤Ÿå¤§ã€‚

Totalmente recomendado

Very Fun and addictive. I highly recommend. However, some killers are way too OP and I find it inconvient that when playing with a friend you have to remake the lobby before each game. Still love this game to death and hope to see it get even better.

June 2nd 2022 (previous reviews still stand)
The Green Glyph Challenges have been bugged for me for weeks. I'll play 4-5hours per day and only see about 1 glyph perk WEEK. I run small game, detective hunch, and counterforce as well. (the challenge says the glyphs spawn near totems, that's why I run those perks). I can't progress in some challenges because of this bug.

Sept 2021 SBMM Update
The game has become completely incoherent & unplayable. Matchmaking is worse than it's ever been thanks to SBMM. Someone with 1k+ hours, should not be going against brand new players. Then right after, go after a sweat killer that 4 Ks with all meta perks.

Also, they lost the Stranger Things DLC. If you care about that.

Do NOT buy this game.
----------------------------

2017
Unless you're running a 4 person SWF, this game is horribly/tremendously balanced in favor of killers. about 28 games out of 30, someone is spawned in the killers shadow, insta-hit & d/cs. The killers facecamp. The killers tunnel. The killers do both. Survivors afk in lockers. For so much shit that can ruin the game if just 1 of these (or more) go wrong, you'd think there'd be a little more favorable perks/things solo players could do to at least pip (if not survive)...but there's not. Entire matches, in a row, will be spent watching the killer while on a hook, or being put on and off hooks until dead, with no other in game actions being had.

August 2020 Edit
All of the above still holds true. Now there's an MMR matchmaking system newly implemented that will give you 49 out of 50 matches of this happening. Unless you want easy wins as killer because you're stressed out IRL and want to take it out on others, don't buy this game (unless you have 3 other friends that will commit to playing with you). Still a horrible experience without a 4 people on comms.

April 2021
For about 6 months now every time there's ANY update for this game, I have to reverify game files or I get booted out mid-match from a EAC error. Only with this game though. I've tried fixes online and a re-install, but no luck. It only happens with this game though so I'm starting to believe it's not my PC.

August 2021
The devs have learned 0 information about what the actual playerbase wants from this game. Killers still camp & tunnel. There's D/C penalties in a casual game...that has ranks...with 0 rewards. Let me be clear, there's no unranked, no ranked, no casual. Just one single matchmaking mode that has ranks...but there's no actual reason behind them... no real rewards to work for. At first they were for matchmaking...but a rank 20 can destroy rank ones with 0 perks and face camping.

The devs complete disconnection from the game has, since my first review, only strengthened the fact that it's nearly impossible to solo queue in this. You'll have survivors of ALL "RANKS" hide in a corner/locker the entire match. No afk penalty. Survivors who don't afk, can just walk around until others die and get the "hatch". A free escape. It's insane that after 3 years literally nothing has changed. Shows how tHeY'Ve dOnE a pRetTy gOoD jOb.

August 12th, 2021 SBMM is on
Despite my teammates doing everything they can and being sweaty as possible
I still get camped through all 3 hookstates
How does SBMM stop me from getting camped through 3 hook stages?
Who the hell asked for this.

August pinhead update
...how does this game still take an hour to re-download the "live" game?
Indie games on steam download faster than dbd...I don't get it.
pretty good
I need to scratch my butt

ADD SLENDERMAN BUT WITHOUT HIM  ITS A GREAT GAME :D
the hag sucks by the way change how OP she is jesus christ, the traps are stupid

I have been obsessed with this game for the past two weeks although the gameplay is a little repetitive having to do the same task over and over again, but the different people you queue with make it different each time. I STRONGLY reccommend this game.
